title: Interpretation of dreams: I traveled to America in a dream

If a married woman sees herself traveling to America in a dream, this may be a sign of kindness and livelihood, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. If a young man is seen traveling in America, perhaps he expresses kindness and sustenance, and God knows best Interpretation of a dream of traveling for treatment in a dream Interpretation of a dream of traveling for treatment in a dream and traveling can indicate striving for self-development and God knows best Where it may express the dreamer's desire for development and God knows best If a young man sees traveling, it may be a sign of good changes and God knows best If a married woman sees herself traveling in a dream, this may be a sign of the changes that occur to the woman, God willing Interpretation of a dream of traveling to Bangladesh in a dream Interpretation of a dream of traveling to Bangladesh in a dream We did not find any specific interpretations for seeing this. However, seeing travel in a dream can be a sign that the dreamer will move to a new place, God willing. Seeing a trip can also express goodness and livelihood, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. In the case of seeing an unmarried girl traveling, it may mean that she has reached a prestigious position, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married woman traveling with her husband in Dubai, this can lead you to a trip to reality, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about stealing a bag of clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about stealing a clothes bag in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about stealing a clothes bag in a dream. It is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants you to know an explanation for that. We will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some diligent scholars, not site managers. It does not enter into interpretations, but rather conveys the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about stealing a bag of clothes in a dream: Stealing a bag of clothes in a dream may indicate his inability to achieve his goals and aspirations in those days, and God knows best. In the case of my personal opinion that he stole a bag of clothes, this may indicate Not making good decisions in those days, and God knows best. Anyone who dreams that he has stolen a bag of clothes may indicate his inability to continue a good relationship with others and must seek Godâ€™s help. Interpretation of a dream about a bag of food in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he keeps his bags Filled with food, it may indicate his religion and closeness to the Blessed and Most High God. Dreaming of a bag of food in a dream could indicate the respect for life that the dreamer has in his life at that time. In case one sees that he has received a bag full of food, this may indicate Indicates that he is a person who is respected by everyone around him, thanks to God. In the event that a person sees a bag containing food in a dream, this may indicate the great life that the dreamer may have in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of receiving a bag of gifts In a dream, receiving a gift bag in a dream can indicate a great love for that person during those days. Whoever dreams that he received a gift bag in a dream, may indicate his responsibility that falls on his shoulders a lot at that time. Seeing a white bag as a gift in a dream may indicate Travel or good work that the dreamer may do in his life during those days. Dreaming about receiving a gift bag in a dream may indicate new changes that may occur to him during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about preparing a honeymoon bag in a dream: Preparing the bag may indicate For a trip in a dream indicates the tension that the dreamer may feel during this time. If you see preparing a honey bag in a dream, this may indicate a desire to change the course of life or travel. Seeing preparing a honeymoon bag in a dream can indicate happy events that may It happened to him in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person giving a bag in a dream. In the case of seeing a dead person, the dreamer is given a bag, which may indicate the inheritance that the dreamer may obtain during his life during these days. In the event that the deceased is seen giving his bag to the dreamer In a dream, this may indicate the return of an expatriate family member from the trip, and an absent person will return to his family on those days. It is possible that seeing the deceased giving a travel bag in a dream to the dreamer may indicate upcoming joys for the people of the house on those days, and God knows best. Seeing the deceased giving his bag in a dream to the living may indicate that his affairs and circumstances will ease in that time.

title: What is the interpretation of eating dates in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Eating dates in a dream Eating dates in a dream is one of the happy visions for a person, because dates are generally delicious and beautiful foods that strengthen the body and give it abundant health and beauty. See what we are interested in clarifying during this article. Eating dates in a dream by Ibn SirinEating dates in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about eating dates indicates many beautiful meanings for the dreamer, especially if these dates are fresh and delicious, as they indicate the recovery of the patient and the removal of the symptoms of the disease. The dream confirms the great interest in the Qurâ€™an, And the desire to carry it inside the chest, so that the dreamer may be guided by it in his life, and be a light for him in the afterlife. There are many changes that the dreamer will witness in his next life, all for the better, such as changing some bad habits that he will soon practice. If a married woman eats these dates and hopes that she will become... Pregnant, there are many chances that this will happen and that she is in good health during pregnancy. As for the pregnant woman who finds food in her dream, it shows her the ease of childbirth, God willing, and that she will not fall into any obstacle or crisis during that. As for the man who eats it in his sleep, he is eating it. Eating dates in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin proves that eating dates in a dream is a happy dream, which explains to the dreamer the abundance of goodness that will be compensated for in the next life, God willing. Among the interpretations of eating dates according to Ibn Sirin is that it is a sign of psychological calm that is not affected by sadness. Or distraction, rather a person enjoys a diet and is satisfied with Godâ€™s will for him. If a person sees himself eating Ajwa dates, some translation experts believe that he will collect a lot of money in the coming period, which will make him a rich, strong and powerful person. Dates in a dream represent successful projects, and therefore if he finds If a person eats them in his dream, experts indicate the possibility of him participating in one of the projects that will bring him a lot of satisfaction and success and bring him money. The abundance of dates and their distribution in a dream is a happy sign in the world of visions, as it indicates abundant rain and the goodness of people, God willing, and this is according to the interpretations of Ibn Sirin has a dream. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. The timing of eating in a dream for a single woman. Imam Nabulsi explains that eating dates in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the strength of her health and Godâ€™s blessings along with her comfort and psychological stability. If she is sad because of some unpleasant things in her life, she will calm down and become... more powerful. All the money that an unmarried woman has can be considered halal money if she sees a dream, and God can increase her wealth for her with His permission. A large number of experts speculate that consumption by unmarried women indicates her marriage to a man who has a high status in society or has great power. If If she turns the dates into dates and eats them in her dream, the vision will be good news of happiness and good news for her with her great wealth and changing her difficult circumstances for the better. By eating spoiled dates, the girl will be surrounded by many unpleasant events.

title: The name Manal in a dream

preview.html: In this article from our Al-Mowafir website, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing this name in a dream, the descriptions of the bearer of this name, and the origin of its name, so stay with us. Interpretation of the appearance of the name Manal in a dream for a single girl. Seeing the name Manal in the dream of an unmarried girl who is still studying means that she has finished her exams. Well and you will succeed, God willing. If an unmarried woman gets engaged and sees the name Manal in her dream, she is happy with her imminent marriage, and God knows best. As for seeing the name Manal in the dream of an unmarried woman who wants to get married, this means that God Almighty will soon give her a good husband. The name Manal also indicates In a dream, traveling abroad, obtaining distant desires and reaching prestigious positions. Whoever deals with an unknown woman named Manal in a dream, she is trying and trying to earn a living. See also: Interpretation of the name Mina in a dream. Interpretation of the appearance of the name Manal in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams A woman named Manal is calling for her. God is pleased to answer her prayers and satisfy her desires. The same applies to a woman who is late in giving birth if she sees the name Manal in her dream. It is a good sign that God Almighty will conceive her soon. And whoever sees in her sleep a young girl named Manal, the dreamer will hug her. It is a sign On the arrival of goodness and nourishment in her life. Whether she saw in her dream that a woman named Manal came to visit her at home or not. It is an example of her husbandâ€™s abundant livelihood and the improvement of his economic conditions. Interpretation of the appearance of the name Manal in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a man sees a woman named Manal in his dream, this is a sign. Good for the fortuneteller, and expresses goodness and success in life. Whether one dreams of the arrival of a fat woman named Manal, this is a sign that his coming year will be full of prosperity and abundance of money. If the dreamer is sick or struggling financially, and he sees in his dream a little girl named Manal, then this Good news of recovery and relief, God willing. Read also: Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretation of dreams with the letter Ayn. The meaning of seeing the name Manal in a pregnant womanâ€™s dream and its interpretation. The appearance of the name Manal in a pregnant womanâ€™s dream holds many good tidings for her and her fetus, God willing. Anya suffered from severe anxiety as her due date approached and she saw the names Manal in her dream. God will bless her with an easy birth. If a pregnant woman sees a woman named Manal during her sleep, she should visit her in the hospital. It is a sign that God will give her whatever boys and girls she desires. Likewise, whoever sees her in her dream as if she is giving birth to a girl, let her be Manal. God will bless her with a son who will have good luck. In the future. Interpretation of the appearance of the name Manal in a dream for young people and its meaning. When a young man sees a young man sleeping as if a girl named Manal comes to him smiling. It is a sign that he will achieve what he wants and get what he wants, God willing. If a young man sees a woman named Manal in his dream, he will give him a gift. He may advance his job, He will be engaged soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the name Manal in a divorced womanâ€™s dream: Seeing the name Manal in a divorced womanâ€™s dream means optimism and good luck and that the coming days will bring her great goodness, God willing. Also, seeing a woman named Manal in a divorced womanâ€™s dream is evidence that comfort has led to

preview.html: The black caftan indicates the sorrows and problems that he goes through in his life, and we will learn a lot about it today from a translatorâ€™s website. Interpretation of seeing a caftan in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a white caftan in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will soon reach a goal in her life. The cut caftan is an indication that she She fell ill during this period of her life. When she sees a caftan and is sad because she did not buy it, this indicates that there are difficult things in her life. And if she is looking for a caftan in her dream, this indicates that she wants to get married very much. An unmarried woman who sees a dark black caftan in The dream indicates her sadness and problems. If the caftan is in her house and she does not want to wear it in the dream because of its bad appearance. It indicates the presence of an evil person who will approach her at this time and make him very sad. An unmarried girl who sees a forest caftan in a dream indicates her involvement in an accident. Seeing a red caftan indicates her marriage to a previously married man, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing colorful clothes in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a caftan in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a long caftan in a dream for a married woman is a sign of goodness and sustenance in her life, God willing. And buying a caftan in a dream is evidence of He is striving for something and soon he will achieve it, and God knows best. A married woman who sees a beautiful caftan in a dream indicates her beautiful and peaceful life. And if she is looking for a caftan in a dream, this is a sign that she will get rid of major problems with her. Or seeing a cut caftan in a dream is a sign of her injury. She may experience some illness at this time in her life. A married woman who sees a dirty caftan in a dream is interpreted as having major problems with her husband. A married woman wearing a long caftan shows that she has overcome the problems of her life. Seeing a white caftan shows the stability of her life and her safety from troubles and tragedies soon. And the black caftan, which is a sign of evil and sadness in the life of a married woman, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a caftan in a dream for a divorced woman. Buying a caftan in a dream for a divorced woman means that abundant wealth and a lot of sustenance will come to her soon. Losing a caftan in a dream indicates fatigue and effort that you do without a goal. Or success. A cut caftan in a dream indicates a lot of sorrows that she will fall into during this period of her life. A divorced woman who sees a caftan and wants to wear it shows her desire to get married. If she wears a caftan and it is tight on her, this is evidence that she has fallen into religion in her life. The black caftan In a dream, it is for evil and illness. A divorced woman will suffer from it a lot. If you see a black caftan in a dream, this indicates difficult things that you cannot get rid of. Seeing a yellow caftan is a sign of the exhaustion that she is experiencing and suffering from at this time in her life. A divorced woman is looking for a caftan, something full of goodness. She cannot reach it. The long caftan indicates her calm and happy life at this time in her life. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about buying a new abayaInterpretation of seeing a caftan in a dream

If she wears a caftan and it is tight on her, this is evidence that she has fallen into religion in her life. The black caftan In a dream, it is for evil and illness. A divorced woman will suffer from it a lot. If you see a black caftan in a dream, this indicates difficult things that you cannot get rid of. Seeing a yellow caftan is a sign of the exhaustion that she is experiencing and suffering from at this time in her life. A divorced woman is looking for a caftan, something full of goodness. She cannot reach it. The long caftan indicates her calm and happy life at this time in her life. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about buying a new abayaInterpretation of seeing a caftan in a dream

title: Interpretation of the kiss on the head of a dead person in a dream and its meaning for good and evil

preview.html: Many would like to know the interpretation of kissing a dead head in a dream in detail. Seeing the deceased is one of the mysterious dreams that some dreamers see on different occasions, but it is one of the visions that carry many associations that are either linked to the dreamer or the deceased. The dreamer can see the dead of his acquaintances, either by family or friends, and it is sometimes believed that seeing them in a dream expresses How much one loves them and longs to see them, but dream interpreters have suggested that seeing dead people in a dream is one of the true visions that convey them. Messages to the dreamer: What did they say about the interpretation of the kiss on the head of the dead person in a dream? This is what you can learn in the encyclopedia in the following lines. Interpretation of the kiss on the head of the dead person in a dreamDream interpreters reported that if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is kissing the head of the deceased, this means that he will achieve what He wants in reality. This vision indicates goodness and happiness for the dreamer, as it indicates that he will receive good news in reality. This vision also portends that the dreamer will be saved from the crises that the dreamer is suffering from and his life will return to stability again. If the dead person whose head the dreamer kisses is in The dream is his brother, so this indicates the strengthening of the dreamerâ€™s relationship with his friends. But if he kisses the head of a dead child in a dream, this is a good sign and indicates death and the end of disputes between him and his family acquaintances. Some dream interpretation scholars have reported that among the general visions of kissing the head of the deceased in a dream, It indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money. One of the promising signs of kissing a dead personâ€™s head in a dream is that it represents an achievement of excellence, whether in studies or for the dreamer. If the dreamer is already suffering from a health problem, then this vision is good news that his health condition will improve, and God knows best. Interpretation Seeing a dead person being kissed in a dream. In the case of kissing a dead person in a dream, dream interpreter Ibn Sirin indicated that this vision means that the deceased must do good deeds for him by praying frequently for mercy and forgiveness, in addition to zakat. If the dreamer sees himself kissing a familiar dead person in In a dream, this dream indicates that something worthy of praise will happen to him. A death dream about kissing a young man symbolizes his marriage to a girl who belongs to the deceasedâ€™s family in reality, and God knows best. In the case of kissing and embracing the dead person, this indicates that the dreamer always prays for the dead person in reality, and this The vision indicates benefiting from the inheritance. Some other interpreters mentioned that kissing the dead in a dream is one of the dreams that express goodness and abundance. If the dreamer is suffering from some health problems, then seeing kissing and hugging the dead indicates something disturbing, represented by the severity of the illness, and God knows best. If the deceased who is kissed in the dream is the father or mother, then this is considered a promising dream, which indicates that the dreamer will achieve what he aspires to in reality. Kissing a dead father in a dream In the event that the dreamer sees that he is kissing his deceased father in a dream, the meaning of this dream lies in The condition of this deceased. This vision is one of the promising visions for those who have R

title: Interpretation of a dream about marrying people I do not know

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about marrying people I do not know: Seeing weddings in a dream can raise many doubts in the dreamerâ€™s mind. It is known that dreams are interpreted the other way around, but this is not the case in all cases. Interpretation scholars explained that the dreamerâ€™s vision of himself at a wedding for people he does not know is different if the party was for people. He knows them. Instead, the interpretation varies depending on the condition of the god himself, if he is sick or experiencing problems in life. Even his social status affects the interpretation of the dream, such as whether the woman is married, pregnant, divorced, or single. Let us get to know the interpretation of the dream of marrying people I do not know. Interpreters say that a person who sees in a dream that he is present at the wedding of people he does not know, This indicates that the differences that the dreamer is going through will soon end. If a person sees in a dream that he is at a wedding with people he does not know, and in reality he is suffering from financial hardship, then God will soon bless him with abundant money, and God knows best. The woman who sees in her dream that she She is sitting with a group of people she does not know at a wedding of people she does not know, this indicates that she is a person who has the ability to take responsibility. If the dreamer is suffering from marital problems, they will soon end and his married life will return to peace and tranquility. Interpretation of a dream about marrying people I do not know Son Sirin, in general arrogance, Ibn Sirin believes that a person seeing himself attending a wedding is one of the good visions, and that it is a sign of goodness and good news for what is good. He explained this with the following evidence: If the dreamer sees that he is at the wedding of a relative or friend, this indicates that he is a person who is always thinking. In all matters. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of an unmarried girl as attending a wedding with people she did not know, as she was always thinking about marriage and wishing God to marry her soon. Whoever sees in a dream that he is going to a wedding with a dead person in reality, this is one of the best visions , as it indicates that one of the sons of the deceased will get married soon. For a man to see himself at a wedding means that he will gain a lot of living by increasing his business or obtaining a promotion and a new position. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a wedding in the house of a relative and this person was Already sick, this may mean that God will die soon or that his health condition will deteriorate, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about participating in an unknown wedding for single women: To see her single woman herself at a wedding does not depend on the degree of her knowledge of the people present at the wedding, but rather on her status in The dream, and below we explain to you some cases of the girl at the wedding and their interpretation. All of them. If a girl sees that she is at a wedding and yet feels very sad, then this is one of the unfavorable visions, because it indicates the opposite, and that she will go to pay her respects to someone close to her. When a girl sees herself at a wedding and dancing while she is happy, the interpreters interpret She is associated with a person with bad morals who does not suit her, so she must beware of this person. Scientists interpreted the vision of a thousand

title: Interpretation of a dream about an iron ladder and a wooden ladder in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing iron and wooden ladders in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, climbing the steps of a wooden ladder, descending an iron ladder and falling from it, or breaking a wooden ladder according to Ibn Sirin and others. An iron ladder in a dream. One of the relatively strange dreams that we see in our dreams and they carry for us many important meanings and associations that every person must know correctly, as iron stairs are among the things that abound in our homes in order to obtain complete safety through these, and there are many different shapes and colors. Where we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing the iron gate as interpreted by the famous translator Ibn Sirin in his interpretations. Interpretation of the iron staircase in a dream: A wooden or metal ladder is a means that a person uses to climb places that do not contain stairs or that cannot be climbed easily, or to repair the house from the inside up to its roof. And its high walls. Sick health for men and women, whether they are married, married or separated in a dream. A wooden ladder in a dream indicates the holder of position, power and status, but he is a hypocrite and deceiver or unjust and unjust. It also indicates position and travel or health, luxury and illness. Whoever sees himself climbing a wooden or metal ladder, this indicates However, he built a house or built a house, and it is said that whoever is looking for work in his life, his vision of climbing a wooden ladder indicates the help of a hypocrite. Or an unjust person or a tyrant in a high position, or a deceiver and a hypocrite. As for someone who goes up to look at the top of the stairs, this indicates travel, but if he goes up to hear the voice of people or them talking, or see their homes or secrets, or he is a spy and astonished, whether he knows it or not, permission. It indicates that he will be promoted at work and he will obtain position, honor, and money. Whoever sees himself standing at the top of the stairs, this indicates that he is a person who follows his curiosity to eavesdrop and listen to conversations from people that do not interest him, or he listens to spy on others in order to benefit from it. Or obtaining an interest without his right, and seeing a ladder lying on the ground means illness and brokenness. It is death on earth, and whoever raises it or takes it and locks it up, if he is sick, he will be cured because his erection indicates health, and for someone who is not sick, it is better. Other interpreters have been told that descending the ladder into a hole means death or calamity, and exiting the hole with a wooden ladder means comfort, happiness, and goodness. Interpretation An iron staircase in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Falling on an iron staircase in a dream. It is one of the dreams that indicate that the dreamer will suffer a great loss of friends and will lose many of those close to him in life and face many problems. Breaking the iron ladder in our dreams is evidence that the dreamer will face problems, but if he falls to the ground from the ladder after breaking it, this is a sign of death. Taking a broken ladder in a dream, and the dreamer repairing it in the dream, is evidence of recovery from illness and reforming his affairs after their corruption, thus achieving goodness. The dreamer standing on the top of the stairs in the dream is evidence of the presence of many intruders who seek to know the secrets of others and the secrets of others.

title: Interpretation of a dream about an accident

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an accident, a dream about an accident during sleep is one of the dreams that many people see during sleep, and because of the interpretation of many interpreters that this dream means that whoever sees this dream means that he will reach it. Harm to him from one of his relatives, and such dreams result from a person being exposed to many pressures and problems in life, which makes him excellent visual food from harsh images that make him sad many times. In this article, today we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about an accident. Seeing the accident in the interpretation of a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the appearance of a car accident in the water indicates the presence of disturbances and problems with the partner, because water in a dream is a sign of emotions, but if he sees that he is drowning, this indicates Anxiety. And very tense. And if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is driving a car and the headlights that facilitate lighting go out, this indicates that the dreamer is unable to make the right decisions, and that he lacks experience and will face many problems in the future. Such dreams are messages for the dreamer to reconsider his actions. And stay away from evil and suffering, and if it is between him and one of his close competitors, work to solve it. The dreamerâ€™s vision of a traffic accident indicates the psychological pressures and disorders that he suffers from. If a person sees in his dream a road on which an accident occurs, this indicates that the road on which the dreamer is walking is full of With difficulties and problems. If a person sees in his dream a car accident and one of his relatives dies, this indicates the fear and anxiety that the dreamer suffers from, in addition to the personâ€™s need to plan goals. Seeing an accident in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees an accident in her dream, it is due to some Disagreements and problems between her and her fiancÃ© or lover, which will lead to their separation. But if a girl sees that the car overturned in an accident, this is an indication that this girl is reckless and does not hesitate to make her decisions and she must carefully study her decisions before making them. If an unmarried girl sees that she has survived From an accident in her dream, it means that she will get rid of a difficult phase in her life. Seeing an unmarried girl escaping from an accident in a dream means that she will succeed in her studies, work, or marriage in the very near future. Seeing an accident in a married womanâ€™s dreamIf a married woman sees an accident in her dream , it means that she is making wrong decisions regarding her family. But if a married woman sees that she survived an accident in her dream, this is a sign that the anxiety and pressure on her will stop. A married woman who sees an accident in a dream, and cries over it, is a sign of remorse. Seeing an accident In general, in a married womanâ€™s dream, it is evidence of the instability of her marital life, and that she is suffering from problems with her husband. And if a married woman sees that the car overturns in a dream, this indicates that she will soon separate from her husband. Seeing an accident in a pregnant womanâ€™s dreamIf a pregnant woman sees an accident in In a dream, it means that her birth will be easy and easy.But if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that a bodice

title: Interpretation of seeing a roof in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I saw myself climbing on the roof of the house in a dream. Rising. The single girl on the roof symbolizes the success and progress she will achieve in her life. Seeing a woman climbing with her husband shows the stability and success of their married life and work. To face difficulties in climbing to the roof is a sign of achieving the ambitions that the dreamer wants, but after effort and exhaustion. Interpretation of a dream about building a roof In a dreamWomenMarried / MarriedThe woman who sees herself building the roof of the house in a dream shows her ability to maintain her home and the virtuous education in which her children are raised. The man who sees that he is repairing the roof of the house is a sign of the disappearance of his worries, the payment of his debts and his relief from the distress he is going through. They symbolize the vision of building a roof The house is in the high position taken by the fortuneteller. This vision shows the dreamerâ€™s ability to build his future as he wants and he will achieve great success in his life. Interpretation of the dream of the roof in the dream of a divorced woman. See the point. He goes up to the roof. The house is the womanâ€™s ability to overcome the problems she is going through. Sitting on the roof of the house is evidence of the security and psychological comfort that she feels. After a divorce, seeing someone helping a divorced woman climb onto the roof is a sign of someone she knows who will help her overcome crises. Feeling afraid of falling from the roof is a sign that he is still afraid of facing people. Interpretation of a dream about praying on the roof of a house. Good news for seeing praying on the house so that the dreamer will be distinguished by his good reputation and good morals that People know by it the young man who sees that he is praying on the roof of the house with the appearance of a religious person who has the ability to recognize him. The dream indicates that the dreamer will gain great fame and his fame will spread. Seeing him praying on the roof with the people of the house symbolizes the goodness and blessing that overwhelms them. The previous vision also indicates the goodness of their circumstances. And their good morals, and the combination of their kindness. Interpretation of a dream about jumping from one roof to another. See the point: Jumping from one roof to another. Another means that the dreamer abandons his goals and ambitions that he wanted to achieve. This vision symbolizes the dreamerâ€™s attempt to escape from the problems and sorrows that he is experiencing, and if it passes to the roof of another, it is an indication of his success in Getting rid of problems. Trying to jump from one roof to another but it collapses, is a sign that you will face misfortunes or sadness in the coming period. Jumping from one roof to another without fear or fatigue is a sign of positive changes that will make the dreamerâ€™s life better. Seeing a jump in a dream foretells goodness and blessings. That the dreamer will get: Climbing the roof of the house in a dream for a single woman. One who sees that she wants to climb the roof of the house and is facing difficulties, is an indication of continuing behind her ambitions until she achieves success, but after she encounters a little trouble. Seeing a single girl climbing the roof of the house symbolizes success in her academic or professional life. And she will be happy in her life. The girl who sits on the roof of the house and feels happy is a sign of excellence in her future life and will feel safe. The girl who stands on the roof and she feels afraid is a sign of her need to prove herself and her abilities and is looking
